verses.verse: אָשִׁ֤ירָה <S%H7891><s%> Now will I sing נָּא֙ <S%H4994><s%> now לִֽידִידִ֔י <S%H3039><s%> to my wellbeloved שִׁירַ֥ת <S%H7892><s%> a song דּוֹדִ֖י <S%H1730><s%> of my beloved לְכַרְמ֑וֹ <S%H3754><s%> touching his vineyard כֶּ֛רֶם <S%H3754><s%> hath a vineyard הָיָ֥ה <S%H1961><s%> had לִֽידִידִ֖י <S%H3039><s%> My wellbeloved בְּקֶ֥רֶן <S%H7161><s%> hill בֶּן־ <S%H1121><s%> afflicted שָֽׁמֶן׃ <S%H8081><s%> anointing

וַֽיְעַזְּקֵ֣הוּ <S%H5823><s%> And he fenced וַֽיְסַקְּלֵ֗הוּ <S%H5619><s%> it and gathered out the stones וַיִּטָּעֵ֙הוּ֙ <S%H5193><s%> thereof and planted שֹׂרֵ֔ק <S%H8321><s%> it with the choicest vine וַיִּ֤בֶן <S%H1129><s%> and built מִגְדָּל֙ <S%H4026><s%> a tower בְּתוֹכ֔וֹ <S%H8432><s%> in the midst וְגַם־ <S%H1571><s%> and also יֶ֖קֶב <S%H3342><s%> a winepress חָצֵ֣ב <S%H2672><s%> of it and also made בּ֑וֹ וַיְקַ֛ו <S%H6960><s%> therein and he looked לַעֲשׂ֥וֹת <S%H6213><s%> that it should bring forth עֲנָבִ֖ים <S%H6025><s%> grapes וַיַּ֥עַשׂ <S%H6213><s%> and it brought forth בְּאֻשִֽׁים׃ <S%H891><s%> wild grapes

וְעַתָּ֛ה <S%H6258><s%> and now יוֹשֵׁ֥ב <S%H3427><s%> And now O inhabitants יְרוּשָׁלִַ֖ם <S%H3389><s%> of Jerusalem וְאִ֣ישׁ <S%H376><s%> and men יְהוּדָ֑ה <S%H3063><s%> of Judah שִׁפְטוּ־ <S%H8199><s%> judge נָ֕א <S%H4994><s%> I beseech thee בֵּינִ֖י <S%H996><s%> between וּבֵ֥ין <S%H996><s%> between כַּרְמִֽי׃ <S%H3754><s%> I pray you betwixt me and my vineyard

מַה־ <S%H4100><s%> What לַּעֲשׂ֥וֹת <S%H6213><s%> What could have been done עוֹד֙ <S%H5750><s%> more לְכַרְמִ֔י <S%H3754><s%> more to my vineyard וְלֹ֥א <S%H3808><s%> have not עָשִׂ֖יתִי <S%H6213><s%> that I have not done בּ֑וֹ מַדּ֧וּעַ <S%H4069><s%> in it? wherefore קִוֵּ֛יתִי <S%H6960><s%> when I looked לַעֲשׂ֥וֹת <S%H6213><s%> that it should bring forth עֲנָבִ֖ים <S%H6025><s%> grapes וַיַּ֥עַשׂ <S%H6213><s%> brought it forth בְּאֻשִֽׁים׃ <S%H891><s%> worthless

וְעַתָּה֙ <S%H6258><s%> now אוֹדִֽיעָה־ <S%H3045><s%> And now go to I will tell נָּ֣א <S%H4994><s%> I beseech thee אֶתְכֶ֔ם <S%H853><s%> אֵ֛ת <S%H853><s%> אֲשֶׁר־ <S%H834><s%> what אֲנִ֥י <S%H589><s%> I am עֹשֶׂ֖ה <S%H6213><s%> you what I will do לְכַרְמִ֑י <S%H3754><s%> to my vineyard הָסֵ֤ר <S%H5493><s%> I will take away מְשׂוּכָּתוֹ֙ <S%H4881><s%> the hedge וְהָיָ֣ה <S%H1961><s%> will become לְבָעֵ֔ר <S%H1197><s%> thereof and it shall be eaten up פָּרֹ֥ץ <S%H6555><s%> [and] break down גְּדֵר֖וֹ <S%H1447><s%> the wall וְהָיָ֥ה <S%H1961><s%> will become לְמִרְמָֽס׃ <S%H4823><s%> thereof and it shall be trodden down

וַאֲשִׁיתֵ֣הוּ <S%H7896><s%> And I will lay בָתָ֗ה <S%H1326><s%> it waste לֹ֤א <S%H3808><s%> not יִזָּמֵר֙ <S%H2168><s%> it shall not be pruned וְלֹ֣א <S%H3808><s%> or יֵעָדֵ֔ר <S%H5737><s%> nor digged וְעָלָ֥ה <S%H5927><s%> but there shall come up שָׁמִ֖יר <S%H8068><s%> briers וָשָׁ֑יִת <S%H7898><s%> and thorns וְעַ֤ל <S%H5921><s%> and הֶעָבִים֙ <S%H5645><s%> the clouds אֲצַוֶּ֔ה <S%H6680><s%> I will also command מֵהַמְטִ֥יר <S%H4305><s%> that they rain עָלָ֖יו <S%H5921><s%> and מָטָֽר׃ <S%H4306><s%> no rain

כִּ֣י <S%H3588><s%> For כֶ֜רֶם <S%H3754><s%> For the vineyard יְהוָ֤ה <S%H3068><s%> of the LORD צְבָאוֹת֙ <S%H6635><s%> of hosts בֵּ֣ית <S%H1004><s%> [is] the house יִשְׂרָאֵ֔ל <S%H3478><s%> of Israel וְאִ֣ישׁ <S%H376><s%> and the men יְהוּדָ֔ה <S%H3063><s%> of Judah נְטַ֖ע <S%H5194><s%> plant שַׁעֲשׁוּעָ֑יו <S%H8191><s%> his pleasant וַיְקַ֤ו <S%H6960><s%> and he looked לְמִשְׁפָּט֙ <S%H4941><s%> for judgment וְהִנֵּ֣ה <S%H2009><s%> behold מִשְׂפָּ֔ח <S%H4939><s%> but behold oppression לִצְדָקָ֖ה <S%H6666><s%> for righteousness וְהִנֵּ֥ה <S%H2009><s%> behold צְעָקָֽה׃ <S%H6818><s%> but behold a cry ס

ה֗וֹי <S%H1945><s%> Woe מַגִּיעֵ֥י <S%H5060><s%> unto them that join בַ֙יִת֙ <S%H1004><s%> house בְּבַ֔יִת <S%H1004><s%> to house שָׂדֶ֥ה <S%H7704><s%> field בְשָׂדֶ֖ה <S%H7704><s%> to field יַקְרִ֑יבוּ <S%H7126><s%> [that] lay עַ֚ד <S%H5704><s%> Until אֶ֣פֶס <S%H657><s%> till [there be] no מָק֔וֹם <S%H4725><s%> place וְהֽוּשַׁבְתֶּ֥ם <S%H3427><s%> that they may be placed לְבַדְּכֶ֖ם <S%H905><s%> alone בְּקֶ֥רֶב <S%H7130><s%> alone in the midst הָאָֽרֶץ׃ <S%H776><s%> of the earth

בְּאָזְנָ֖י <S%H241><s%> In mine ears יְהוָ֣ה <S%H3068><s%> [said] the LORD צְבָא֑וֹת <S%H6635><s%> of hosts אִם־ <S%H518><s%> lo לֹ֞א <S%H3808><s%> Of a truth בָּתִּ֤ים <S%H1004><s%> houses רַבִּים֙ <S%H7227><s%> many לְשַׁמָּ֣ה <S%H8047><s%> shall be desolate יִֽהְי֔וּ <S%H1961><s%> shall become גְּדֹלִ֥ים <S%H1419><s%> [even] great וְטוֹבִ֖ים <S%H2896><s%> and fair מֵאֵ֥ין <S%H369><s%> without יוֹשֵֽׁב׃ <S%H3427><s%> without inhabitant

כִּ֗י <S%H3588><s%> Yea עֲשֶׂ֙רֶת֙ <S%H6235><s%> ten צִמְדֵּי־ <S%H6776><s%> acres כֶ֔רֶם <S%H3754><s%> of vineyard יַעֲשׂ֖וּ <S%H6213><s%> shall yield בַּ֣ת <S%H1324><s%> bath אֶחָ֑ת <S%H259><s%> one וְזֶ֥רַע <S%H2233><s%> and the seed חֹ֖מֶר <S%H2563><s%> of an homer יַעֲשֶׂ֥ה <S%H6213><s%> shall yield אֵיפָֽה׃ <S%H374><s%> an ephah פ

ה֛וֹי <S%H1945><s%> Woe מַשְׁכִּימֵ֥י <S%H7925><s%> unto them that rise up early בַבֹּ֖קֶר <S%H1242><s%> in the morning שֵׁכָ֣ר <S%H7941><s%> strong drink יִרְדֹּ֑פוּ <S%H7291><s%> [that] they may follow מְאַחֲרֵ֣י <S%H309><s%> that continue בַנֶּ֔שֶׁף <S%H5399><s%> until night יַ֖יִן <S%H3196><s%> [till] wine יַדְלִיקֵֽם׃ <S%H1814><s%> inflame

וְהָיָ֨ה <S%H1961><s%> are by כִנּ֜וֹר <S%H3658><s%> And the harp וָנֶ֗בֶל <S%H5035><s%> and the viol תֹּ֧ף <S%H8596><s%> the tabret וְחָלִ֛יל <S%H2485><s%> and pipe וָיַ֖יִן <S%H3196><s%> and wine מִשְׁתֵּיהֶ֑ם <S%H4960><s%> are in their feasts וְאֵ֨ת <S%H853><s%> פֹּ֤עַל <S%H6467><s%> not the work יְהוָה֙ <S%H3068><s%> of the LORD לֹ֣א <S%H3808><s%> Nor יַבִּ֔יטוּ <S%H5027><s%> but they regard וּמַעֲשֵׂ֥ה <S%H4639><s%> the operation יָדָ֖יו <S%H3027><s%> of his hands לֹ֥א <S%H3808><s%> Nor רָאֽוּ׃ <S%H7200><s%> neither consider

לָכֵ֛ן <S%H3651><s%> Therefore גָּלָ֥ה <S%H1540><s%> are gone into captivity עַמִּ֖י <S%H5971><s%> Therefore my people מִבְּלִי־ <S%H1097><s%> their lack דָ֑עַת <S%H1847><s%> because [they have] no knowledge וּכְבוֹדוֹ֙ <S%H3519><s%> and their honourable מְתֵ֣י <S%H4962><s%> men רָעָ֔ב <S%H7458><s%> [are] famished וַהֲמוֹנ֖וֹ <S%H1995><s%> and their multitude צִחֵ֥ה <S%H6704><s%> dried up צָמָֽא׃ <S%H6772><s%> with thirst

לָכֵ֗ן <S%H3651><s%> Therefore הִרְחִ֤יבָה <S%H7337><s%> hath enlarged שְּׁאוֹל֙ <S%H7585><s%> Therefore hell נַפְשָׁ֔הּ <S%H5315><s%> herself וּפָעֲרָ֥ה <S%H6473><s%> and opened פִ֖יהָ <S%H6310><s%> her mouth לִבְלִי־ <S%H1097><s%> without חֹ֑ק <S%H2706><s%> without measure וְיָרַ֨ד <S%H3381><s%> shall descend הֲדָרָ֧הּ <S%H1926><s%> and their glory וַהֲמוֹנָ֛הּ <S%H1995><s%> and their multitude וּשְׁאוֹנָ֖הּ <S%H7588><s%> and their pomp וְעָלֵ֥ז <S%H5938><s%> and he that rejoiceth בָּֽהּ׃

וַיִּשַּׁ֥ח <S%H7817><s%> shall be brought down אָדָ֖ם <S%H120><s%> And the mean man וַיִּשְׁפַּל־ <S%H8213><s%> shall be humbled אִ֑ישׁ <S%H376><s%> and the mighty man וְעֵינֵ֥י <S%H5869><s%> and the eyes גְבֹהִ֖ים <S%H1364><s%> of the lofty תִּשְׁפַּֽלְנָה׃ <S%H8213><s%> shall be humbled

וַיִּגְבַּ֛ה <S%H1361><s%> shall be exalted יְהוָ֥ה <S%H3068><s%> But the LORD צְבָא֖וֹת <S%H6635><s%> of hosts בַּמִּשְׁפָּ֑ט <S%H4941><s%> in judgment וְהָאֵל֙ <S%H410><s%> and God הַקָּד֔וֹשׁ <S%H6918><s%> that is holy נִקְדָּ֖שׁ <S%H6942><s%> shall be sanctified בִּצְדָקָֽה׃ <S%H6666><s%> in righteousness

וְרָע֥וּ <S%H7462><s%> feed כְבָשִׂ֖ים <S%H3532><s%> Then shall the lambs כְּדָבְרָ֑ם <S%H1699><s%> after their manner וְחָרְב֥וֹת <S%H2723><s%> and the waste places מֵחִ֖ים <S%H4220><s%> of the fat ones גָּרִ֥ים <S%H1481><s%> shall strangers יֹאכֵֽלוּ׃ <S%H398><s%> eat

ה֛וֹי <S%H1945><s%> Woe מֹשְׁכֵ֥י <S%H4900><s%> unto them that draw הֶֽעָוֹ֖ן <S%H5771><s%> iniquity בְּחַבְלֵ֣י <S%H2256><s%> with cords הַשָּׁ֑וְא <S%H7723><s%> of vanity וְכַעֲב֥וֹת <S%H5688><s%> rope הָעֲגָלָ֖ה <S%H5699><s%> as it were with a cart חַטָּאָֽה׃ <S%H2403><s%> and sin

הָאֹמְרִ֗ים <S%H559><s%> That say יְמַהֵ֧ר ׀ <S%H4116><s%> Let him make speed יָחִ֛ישָׁה <S%H2363><s%> [and] hasten מַעֲשֵׂ֖הוּ <S%H4639><s%> his work לְמַ֣עַן <S%H4616><s%> because of נִרְאֶ֑ה <S%H7200><s%> that we may see וְתִקְרַ֣ב <S%H7126><s%> draw nigh וְתָב֗וֹאָה <S%H935><s%> and come עֲצַ֛ת <S%H6098><s%> [it] and let the counsel קְד֥וֹשׁ <S%H6918><s%> of the Holy One יִשְׂרָאֵ֖ל <S%H3478><s%> of Israel וְנֵדָֽעָה׃ <S%H3045><s%> that we may know ס

ה֣וֹי <S%H1945><s%> Woe הָאֹמְרִ֥ים <S%H559><s%> unto them that call לָרַ֛ע <S%H7451><s%> evil ט֖וֹב <S%H2896><s%> good וְלַטּ֣וֹב <S%H2896><s%> and good רָ֑ע <S%H7451><s%> evil שָׂמִ֨ים <S%H7760><s%> that put חֹ֤שֶׁךְ <S%H2822><s%> darkness לְאוֹר֙ <S%H216><s%> for light וְא֣וֹר <S%H216><s%> and light לְחֹ֔שֶׁךְ <S%H2822><s%> for darkness שָׂמִ֥ים <S%H7760><s%> that put מַ֛ר <S%H4751><s%> bitter לְמָת֖וֹק <S%H4966><s%> for sweet וּמָת֥וֹק <S%H4966><s%> and sweet לְמָֽר׃ <S%H4751><s%> for bitter ס

ה֖וֹי <S%H1945><s%> Woe חֲכָמִ֣ים <S%H2450><s%> unto [them that are] wise בְּעֵֽינֵיהֶ֑ם <S%H5869><s%> in their own eyes וְנֶ֥גֶד <S%H5048><s%> their own פְּנֵיהֶ֖ם <S%H6440><s%> in their own sight נְבֹנִֽים׃ <S%H995><s%> and prudent

ה֕וֹי <S%H1945><s%> Woe גִּבּוֹרִ֖ים <S%H1368><s%> unto [them that are] mighty לִשְׁתּ֣וֹת <S%H8354><s%> to drink יָ֑יִן <S%H3196><s%> wine וְאַנְשֵׁי־ <S%H582><s%> and men חַ֖יִל <S%H2428><s%> of strength לִמְסֹ֥ךְ <S%H4537><s%> to mingle שֵׁכָֽר׃ <S%H7941><s%> strong drink

מַצְדִּיקֵ֥י <S%H6663><s%> Which justify רָשָׁ֖ע <S%H7563><s%> the wicked עֵ֣קֶב <S%H6118><s%> for שֹׁ֑חַד <S%H7810><s%> reward וְצִדְקַ֥ת <S%H6666><s%> the righteousness צַדִּיקִ֖ים <S%H6662><s%> of the righteous יָסִ֥ירוּ <S%H5493><s%> and take away מִמֶּֽנּוּ׃ <S%H4480><s%> at ס

לָכֵן֩ <S%H3651><s%> Therefore כֶּאֱכֹ֨ל <S%H398><s%> devoureth קַ֜שׁ <S%H7179><s%> the stubble לְשׁ֣וֹן <S%H3956><s%> A tongue אֵ֗שׁ <S%H784><s%> Therefore as the fire וַחֲשַׁ֤שׁ <S%H2842><s%> the chaff לֶֽהָבָה֙ <S%H3852><s%> the flame יִרְפֶּ֔ה <S%H7503><s%> consumeth שָׁרְשָׁם֙ <S%H8328><s%> [so] their root כַּמָּ֣ק <S%H4716><s%> shall be as rottenness יִֽהְיֶ֔ה <S%H1961><s%> will become וּפִרְחָ֖ם <S%H6525><s%> and their blossom כָּאָבָ֣ק <S%H80><s%> as dust יַעֲלֶ֑ה <S%H5927><s%> shall go up כִּ֣י <S%H3588><s%> for מָאֲס֗וּ <S%H3988><s%> because they have cast away אֵ֚ת <S%H853><s%> תּוֹרַת֙ <S%H8451><s%> the law יְהוָ֣ה <S%H3068><s%> of the LORD צְבָא֔וֹת <S%H6635><s%> of hosts וְאֵ֛ת <S%H853><s%> אִמְרַ֥ת <S%H565><s%> the word קְדֽוֹשׁ־ <S%H6918><s%> of the Holy One יִשְׂרָאֵ֖ל <S%H3478><s%> of Israel נִאֵֽצוּ׃ <S%H5006><s%> and despised

עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> against כֵּ֡ן <S%H3651><s%> this חָרָה֩ <S%H2734><s%> kindled אַף־ <S%H639><s%> Therefore is the anger יְהוָ֨ה <S%H3068><s%> of the LORD בְּעַמּ֜וֹ <S%H5971><s%> against his people וַיֵּ֣ט <S%H5186><s%> and he hath stretched forth יָד֧וֹ <S%H3027><s%> his hand עָלָ֣יו <S%H5921><s%> against וַיַּכֵּ֗הוּ <S%H5221><s%> against them and hath smitten וַֽיִּרְגְּזוּ֙ <S%H7264><s%> did tremble הֶֽהָרִ֔ים <S%H2022><s%> them and the hills וַתְּהִ֧י <S%H1961><s%> lay נִבְלָתָ֛ם <S%H5038><s%> and their carcases כַּסּוּחָ֖ה <S%H5478><s%> [were] torn בְּקֶ֣רֶב <S%H7130><s%> in the midst חוּצ֑וֹת <S%H2351><s%> of the streets בְּכָל־ <S%H3605><s%> for all זֹאת֙ <S%H2063><s%> likewise לֹא־ <S%H3808><s%> is not שָׁ֣ב <S%H7725><s%> is not turned away אַפּ֔וֹ <S%H639><s%> For all this his anger וְע֖וֹד <S%H5750><s%> is still יָד֥וֹ <S%H3027><s%> but his hand נְטוּיָֽה׃ <S%H5186><s%> [is] stretched out

וְנָֽשָׂא־ <S%H5375><s%> And he will lift up נֵ֤ס <S%H5251><s%> an ensign לַגּוֹיִם֙ <S%H1471><s%> to the nations מֵרָח֔וֹק <S%H7350><s%> from far וְשָׁ֥רַק <S%H8319><s%> and will hiss ל֖וֹ מִקְצֵ֣ה <S%H7097><s%> unto them from the end הָאָ֑רֶץ <S%H776><s%> of the earth וְהִנֵּ֥ה <S%H2009><s%> and behold מְהֵרָ֖ה <S%H4120><s%> with speed קַ֥ל <S%H7031><s%> swiftly יָבֽוֹא׃ <S%H935><s%> and behold they shall come

אֵין־ <S%H369><s%> No עָיֵ֤ף <S%H5889><s%> None shall be weary וְאֵין־ <S%H369><s%> one כּוֹשֵׁל֙ <S%H3782><s%> nor stumble בּ֔וֹ לֹ֥א <S%H3808><s%> None יָנ֖וּם <S%H5123><s%> among them none shall slumber וְלֹ֣א <S%H3808><s%> Nor יִישָׁ֑ן <S%H3462><s%> nor sleep וְלֹ֤א <S%H3808><s%> Nor נִפְתַּח֙ <S%H6605><s%> be loosed אֵז֣וֹר <S%H232><s%> neither shall the girdle חֲלָצָ֔יו <S%H2504><s%> of their loins וְלֹ֥א <S%H3808><s%> Nor נִתַּ֖ק <S%H5423><s%> be broken שְׂר֥וֹךְ <S%H8288><s%> nor the latchet נְעָלָֽיו׃ <S%H5275><s%> of their shoes

אֲשֶׁ֤ר <S%H834><s%> its חִצָּיו֙ <S%H2671><s%> Whose arrows שְׁנוּנִ֔ים <S%H8150><s%> [are] sharp וְכָל־ <S%H3605><s%> and all קַשְּׁתֹתָ֖יו <S%H7198><s%> and all their bows דְּרֻכ֑וֹת <S%H1869><s%> bent פַּרְס֤וֹת <S%H6541><s%> hoofs סוּסָיו֙ <S%H5483><s%> their horses' כַּצַּ֣ר <S%H6862><s%> like flint נֶחְשָׁ֔בוּ <S%H2803><s%> shall be counted וְגַלְגִּלָּ֖יו <S%H1534><s%> and their wheels כַּסּוּפָֽה׃ <S%H5492><s%> like a whirlwind

שְׁאָגָ֥ה <S%H7581><s%> Their roaring ל֖וֹ כַּלָּבִ֑יא <S%H3833><s%> [shall be] like a lion [וְשָׁאַג כ] (יִשְׁאַ֨ג <S%H7580><s%> mightily ק) כַּכְּפִירִ֤ים <S%H3715><s%> like young lions וְיִנְהֹם֙ <S%H5098><s%> yea they shall roar וְיֹאחֵ֣ז <S%H270><s%> and lay hold טֶ֔רֶף <S%H2964><s%> of the prey וְיַפְלִ֖יט <S%H6403><s%> and shall carry [it] away safe וְאֵ֥ין <S%H369><s%> no מַצִּֽיל׃ <S%H5337><s%> and none shall deliver

וְיִנְהֹ֥ם <S%H5098><s%> they shall roar עָלָ֛יו <S%H5921><s%> over בַּיּ֥וֹם <S%H3117><s%> And in that day הַה֖וּא <S%H1931><s%> he כְּנַהֲמַת־ <S%H5100><s%> against them like the roaring יָ֑ם <S%H3220><s%> of the sea וְנִבַּ֤ט <S%H5027><s%> and if [one] look לָאָ֙רֶץ֙ <S%H776><s%> unto the land וְהִנֵּה־ <S%H2009><s%> behold חֹ֔שֶׁךְ <S%H2822><s%> behold darkness צַ֣ר <S%H6862><s%> [and] sorrow וָא֔וֹר <S%H216><s%> and the light חָשַׁ֖ךְ <S%H2821><s%> is darkened בַּעֲרִיפֶֽיהָ׃ <S%H6183><s%> in the heavens פ
